attributes.action: Stop digital face recognition cameras at the supermarket check out.
attributes.additional_details: To debate and hopefully stop the use of digital face recognition cameras at supermarkets

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what security measures to have in place are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for facial recognition cameras to be banned, so they cannot be used by any retailers or other businesses.
